data.scheme_name: Revised Market Development Assistance Scheme - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement of upto Rs. 5.50 lakhs for international exhibitions, up to Rs. 3.75 lakhs for national exhibitions.
data.eligibility: All existing  industrial units are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
The unit should not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government.
The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit must be in commercial production.
The unit must be in regular production at the time of reimbursement.
Assistance will not be given to closed units.
Only regular employees, Directors, or Proprietors of the enterprise/company are allowed to participate in domestic fairs/exhibitions.
data.beneficiaries: All existing  industrial units are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
The unit should not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government.
The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit must be in commercial production.
The unit must be in regular production at the time of reimbursement.
Assistance will not be given to closed units.
Only regular employees, Directors, or Proprietors of the enterprise/company are allowed to participate in domestic fairs/exhibitions.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: In pursuance to the provision under Chapter 14 of the Haryana Enterprises & Employment Policy-2020 notified in Gazette vide No.25/05/2020-4IB-I dated 29.12020, the Governor of Haryana is notified the “Market Development Assistance Scheme” for the Micro and Small enterprises located anywhere in the State.
data.objective: To support Micro and Small enterprises for the sales promotion of products by providing financial support for participation in national/ international level exhibition in the country and abroad.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement for participation in trade fairs/exhibition:
For Domestic Fair
Space charges/ Shipment and Transportation/ Display Material/Stand stall: 75% reimbursement of given expenses, upto Rs.4 lakhs
Air fare (economy class):	Up to Rs.1 lakh
Boarding charges: Rs.0.50 lakhs 
Maximum cap for domestic fair is Rs.5.5 lakhs

For International Fair:
Space charges/ Shipment and Transportation/ Display Material/Stand stall: 75% reimbursement of given expenses, upto Rs.3 lakhs
Air fare (economy class):	Up to Rs.0.5 lakh
Boarding charges: Rs.0.25 lakhs 
Maximum cap for International fair is Rs. 3.75 lakhs
data.how_to_apply:
Application on prescribed Form (Annexure-I) for the grant of Market Development Assistance on the participation in exhibition along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises on web portal of the department within three months of the closing date of the exhibition participated or from the date of notification of the scheme, whichever is later.
Annexure-I : https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2023/08/202308282144948700.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana - MSEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
